name: HSP_BKT_INV_NUM
description: This table contains hospital liability bucket invoice numbers information from the Hospital Liability Buckets (HLB) master file.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bucket record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. Because multiple invoices can be associated with a liability bucket, each invoice will have a unique line number.

columns.name: INVOICE_NUMBER
columns.description: An invoice number associated with the liability bucket.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account to which the liability bucket is linked.
